catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 617
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: Deep dish with blue design of a chrysanthemum with stream emanating; clusters of foliage around flower and stream; two flying birds at far R; ribbing along inner edge; dish stands on three feet
medium: Imari ware; Porcelain with celadon glaze and underglaze cobalt blue
title: Deep Dish with Chrysanthemum in a Stream
